title: Wall Street will likely see worst earnings season in about three years, Nick Colas warns
text: Disappointing earnings could wreck 2019's market rally, according to DataTrek Research's Nick Colas.

title: 'One of the worst inventions is the shared calendar' says Basecamp CEO
text: Basecamp co-founder and CEO Jason Fried is speaking out against endless meetings, emails, being on call 24/7 and 80-hour workweeks. Nothing will change, he says, until people raise their hands and voices and demand: 'We need to have a life.
